verses.roman:
eta bali' purī-gosāñi gelā nija-sthāne
haridāsa-sthāne gelā saba bhakta-gaṇe

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; purī-gosāñi—Paramānanda Gosāñi; gelā—left; nija-sthāne—for his own place; haridāsa-sthāne—unto the place of Junior Haridāsa; gelā—went; saba bhakta-gaṇe—all the other devotees.
translation: After saying this, Paramānanda Purī Gosāñi left for his own home. Then all the devotees went to see Junior Haridāsa.
